content: Credit Card Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 Jun 2019Any good credit cards for earning miles with SimplyGo? And does certain card terms & conditions still apply? For example, DBS Altitude Card requires $5 local spend for 3 DBS points...etc?Can anyone recommend a credit card to use for SimplyGo so that I can maximise the benefits?2 answersAnswerBump0

Vincent Tan Wen Bin, Assistant Vice President at Thinkers AllianceLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 12 Jun 2019I think there's an article that did a pretty good summary. You can read it herehttps://blog.moneysmart.sg/transportation/transitlink-simplygo-abt/0 comments1

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 17 Jun 2019SimplyGo is not a "special" category to earn miles so any miles earning cards will do.You can refer to this article for more info.https://milelion.com/2019/06/08/simplygo-guide-what-card-to-use-and-promotions-summary/0 comments0
